subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Even by the tumultuous standards of the end of an N.F.L. season, this season’s Black Monday stood out: a total of seven coaches and five managers were fired.
snippet: Even by the tumultuous standards of the end of an N.F.L. season, this season’s Black Monday stood out: a total of seven coaches and five managers were fired.
